about_the_game:
Demo Note: This game is in active development and reviews and feedback are very welcome. Since the full release will include many more stages, characters, items, and game modes to unlock, I'm currently planning to keep the Demo live right up until release!

Chaotic Party Platforming

Relive the joy of classic playground fun in quick and crazy rounds for up to 6 players!

Items and Unlocks for Days (DEMO CONTENT)

  • Discover 20+ power-ups, weapons, and obstacles that stack and interact in astonishing ways

  • Unlock a dynamic stage and cute pixel-y character, brimming with unique themes and features

Precise, Frantic Controls

  • Swipe at just the right moment to tag your foes

  • Wall jump, platform, and grab items to outrun and outplay everyone

  • With just three buttons and a joystick, controls are easy to pick up but challenging to master

Shake Things Up

  • Pick your favorite game mode, or play a random one each round

  • Customize your perfect rules and settings for maximum fun

  • Play as individuals or teams, with or without AI bots

Super Platform Tag is best enjoyed with controllers when playing with more than one person

name: Super Platform Tag Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tag, chase, and outsmart your friends in this chaotic platformer party game featuring your favorite variations of tag. Snag crazy power-ups, place obstacles to gain a winning edge, and unlock a colorful cast of characters and stages. Enjoy the ignorant bliss of childhood.
